title: Award-Winning Manor Stay in the Heart of Historic Cork
description: Period-style elegance and sheer luxury await on this exceptional Ireland escape fit for a lord: venture to the cobblestoned heart of Cork for a historic stay at Hayfield Manor, built in 1815. Sitting peacefully within a lush walled garden and perched on a hill overlooking the University College Cork Campus, this countryside retreat is within walking distance of the famous English Market and historic sites including the St. Fin Barre’s Cathedral and 17th-century Elizabeth Fort. Experience a quintessential Irish escape with three-nights in a Manor King Room, daily buffet breakfast and a charcuterie board with artisanal cheeses and a bottle of wine to share.
offer_address: Perrott Ave, College Rd, Centre, Cork, T12 HT97, Ireland

title: Five-Star Manor Stay in the Heart of Historic Cork
description: Period-style elegance and unrivalled luxury await at Hayfield Manor, an exceptional escape in the heart of Cork, Ireland. Wrapped in a historic 1815 façade and lush green vines, this manor maintains its boutique charms thanks to stylish touches throughout the property, including an original marble fireplace and Georgian-style windows illuminating the ornate artworks and antiques. The manor’s excellent facilities include Beautique Spa, Orchids fine dining restaurant and Perrots Garden Bistro. Venture a little further away to visit the Blarney Castle and Gardens, Cork City Gaol or Saint Fin Barre's Cathedral before visiting the popular English Markets.
offer_address: Perrott Avenue, College Road, City Centre, T12 HT97, Cork City, Ireland
